definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Alan Tam (1950-), Hong Kong Canto-pop singer and actor
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)

sentences.english: No reason for disgust, she intones, no cause for condemnation.
sentences.chinese: 她咏吟道，没必要去厌恶，没理由去责难。

sentences.english: Jiao Yanshou and Wang Zhaojun lived in the same time. Jiao Yanshou wrote two poems of Zhaojun.
sentences.chinese: 焦延寿和昭君是同时代的人，他写过两首咏昭君的诗。

sentences.english: Detong, post it under Appendix 1 of Bath Pond book.
sentences.chinese: 茶桶，将此上传至《浴塘游咏》的附录一中。

sentences.english: The series of poems"Singing the poor"displayed the subject intensively.
sentences.chinese: 特别是《咏贫士》组诗，对此表现尤为集中。

sentences.english: And He'll give you a new, sweet song.
sentences.chinese: 他会教你一首新的咏吟。

sentences.english: Tang Dynasty was a period of full boom of the chant poems on chivalry.
sentences.chinese: 唐代是咏侠诗的繁荣鼎盛时期。

sentences.english: Fool. In my heart, you forever are first .
sentences.chinese: 在莪惢脏中，伱咏远是第一。

sentences.english: Chapter Two tells of the music characteristics of Gregorian Chant.
sentences.chinese: 第二章讲述了格里高利圣咏的音乐特征。

sentences.english: And beauty making beautiful old rhyme.
sentences.chinese: 还有香艳美人们古老的颂咏。

sentences.english: Kids learn that accident, requirements of heart to take them to the hospital to visit.
sentences.chinese: 小鬼们得悉福伯出事，要求咏心带他们到医院探望。

sentences.english: Write down the poem of 'Yong Chong Yang' ?
sentences.chinese: 唐代诗人《咏重阳》的诗是什么？

sentences.english: The other, Yong Ching Ming poetry very much, Du Mu, "Qingming" the most famous poems.
sentences.chinese: 另，咏清明诗极多，杜牧《清明》诗最为著名。

sentences.english: Scores are provided. Teachers can play the piano and sing the songs with the children.
sentences.chinese: 附儿歌曲谱，方便教师自行弹奏，与幼儿一起唱咏。

sentences.english: Detong, include this in the appendix 1 of the Bath Pond book.
sentences.chinese: 茶桶，将此篇列入浴塘游咏的附录一中。

sentences.english: After all, we both read poetry.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟我们都咏读过不少诗歌。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
to write a poem using another poem's rhymes
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
